# Skill Authoring Reference

This page is the entry point for deeper skill authoring guidance.

## Sections

- [Patterns](./PATTERNS.md): Proven structures and examples for skill content.
- [Advanced Patterns](./ADVANCED.md): Complex workflows and scaling guidance.
- [Configuration Options](./CONFIG.md): Frontmatter and layout conventions.

## Recommended Reading Order

1. Start with [Patterns](./PATTERNS.md)
2. Then read [Advanced Patterns](./ADVANCED.md)
3. Use [Configuration Options](./CONFIG.md) as a checklist while editing
